title: Cindy Crawford dons disco diva chic for Hollywood Halloween party with Justin Timberlake
text:

Cindy Crawford looked incredible as she headed out for Halloween dressed as a 70s disco diva.

The model totally transformed her look as she donned a colourful sequin jumpsuit, red-tinted sunglasses and a giant curly brunette wig.

The 53-year-old was among the celebs who partied the night away at last night's Casamingos Halloween Party, held at a private residence in Beverly Hills, California.

Also among the guests was Justin Timberlake, who took the opportunity to dress up as a giant microphone.

The former NSync star headed to the bash with his wife Jessica Biel.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: CPR/Nemo/Sanchez / BACKGRID)

Paris Hilton was also snapped heading into the showbiz party.

The hotel heiress and reality star showed off her enivable pins in a pink corset with lace detailing and a pair of matching gloves.

She finished off her Moulin Rouge-style look with a feathery headpiece.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: Getty Images for Casamigos)

Game show host Jeff Probst showed off his spooky look as he posed up for a snap with hi wife Lisa Ann Russell and Foo Fighters star Dave Grohl, who dressed up with a pair of goggles.

The Vampire Diaries star Nina Dobrev was there too wearing bright orange shorts and a jumper, with the roots of her hair dyed green and scary-looking make up.

Arnold Schwarzenegger's actor son Patrick also headed to bash, dressed up as Austin Powers for the night.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

He was joined by his girlfriend Abby Champion who dressed up as one of the sexy robots from the comedy film starring Mike Myers.

Model and actress Molly Sims became a genie for the night.

And MMA fighter Chuck Liddell dressed up as Batman villain The Joker.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

The hardman went all out with a bright purple suit, curly green wig and the wild make up famously worn by the comic book character.
